New Records: Nikola Jokic recorded the first game of 20+ points, 15+ rebounds, and 15+ assists in under 30 minutes in NBA history.
Key Match Events: Nikola Jokic had 23 points, 17 rebounds, and 15 assists for his 14th triple-double of the season and third in four games.
Russell Westbrook had 16 points and 11 assists.
Michael Porter Jr. and Jamal Murray contributed 21 points each.
Denver Nuggets had a season-high 44 assists.
Trae Young led the Hawks with 30 points and nine assists.
The Nuggets scored 40 points in the first quarter but couldn’t shake Atlanta, which rallied to lead 62-57 in the second quarter.
Denver responded to take a 74-71 lead at halftime.
The Nuggets took control with a dominant third quarter, extending the lead to 84-75 in the first three minutes.
Denver continued their 18-3 run that gave them a 20-point lead.
Jokic scored eight points in the final 3:48 and finished his night with 15 assists.
